price: Mpaka yanapo mfikia mmoja wao mauti, husema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Nirudishe.
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ ٱرۡجِعُونِ
footnotes: Wanaendelea kuwakanusha mpaka utapo fika wakati wa kufa mmoja wao hujuta na akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Nirudishe duniani.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadahumu al-mawtu qāla rabbi ir'jiʿūni
